```{r setup}
library(RNAseqStat)
```

Firstly load results data from DEG analysis in step 2.
For example, a DEG data frame produced by DEGSeq2 and group_list

```{r loadData}
head(DEG_df)[1:10,]
table(group_list)
```

Up and Down gene should be grouped ahead of Enrichment analysis. A handly function proved in our package

```{r groupData}
DEG_df_g <- cut_much(DEG_df,x = "log2FoldChange",y = "pvalue",cut_FC = 2,cut_P = 0.01)
```
